titles.title: Making Servicemember Foreclosure Protections Permanent Act
To make foreclosure and eviction protections for servicemembers permanent, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Making Servicemember Foreclosure Protections Permanent Act
Amends the Honoring America's Veterans and Caring for Camp Lejeune Families Act of 2012 to make permanent the extended one-year period after a servicemember's military service during which: (1) a court may stay proceedings to enforce an obligation on real or personal property owned by the servicemember prior to such military service; and (2) the sale, foreclosure, or seizure of such property is invalid without a court order or agreement.
